ARABIC: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَخْلُفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If We wished We could appoint angels in exchange for you to succeed you on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If We pleased We could have put angels in place of you as trustees on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If We had so willed We could have made some of you into angels to become your successors on earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had We wanted, We could have made the angels as your successors on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if We willed, We could have established angels on the earth instead of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if it were Our will, We would have made angels to replace you on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if We please, We could make among you angels to be successors in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Had We willed, We would have appointed angels among you to be successors in the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And had We willed We could have set among you angels to be viceroys in the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: if We had so wished, We could have appointed angels in exchange for you to succeed you on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And had We willed We could have appointed angels born of you in the earth to succeed each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Had We wished We would have set angels in your stead to be [your] successors on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if it were Our Will, We could make angels from amongst you, succeeding each other on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if it were Our Will, We would have [destroyed you (mankind) all, and] made angels to replace you on the earth. [Tafsir At-Tabari, Vol: 25, Page 89].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Had it been Our Will We would have made angels among you as successors in the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Had We willed, We would have made of you angels to be successors on earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:60] And had We willed, We would have appointed among you, instead of you, angels to be [your] successors in the earth, by Our destroying you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And had We willed We could have set among you) in your own places; and it is said this means: had We willed We would have created instead of you (angels to be vicegerents in the earth) angels instead of you; it is also said this means: angels to walk in the earth instead of you.
